Usually distributed by downloading online software that displays most often in a pop-up window that is difficult to control.
Used to gather information about a user and send the information to another entity, without the userâ€™s consent.
Program used by hackers to gain Administrator-account level access to a computer. It is very difficult to detect.
Denies access to the infected computer system and requires payment for the restriction to be removed.
This malware is a self-replicating program that spreads automatically. It slows or disrupts network operations.
